scripts.build:local: yarn clean && yarn clean && yarn workspace @yac/auth-ui build:local && NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 webpack --bail --config ../../config/webpack/webpack.config.ts
scripts.build:dev: yarn clean && yarn clean && yarn workspace @yac/auth-ui build:dev && NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 webpack --bail --config ../../config/webpack/webpack.config.ts
scripts.build:stage: yarn clean && yarn clean && yarn workspace @yac/auth-ui build:stage && NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 webpack --bail --config ../../config/webpack/webpack.config.ts
scripts.build:prod: yarn clean && yarn clean && yarn workspace @yac/auth-ui build:prod && NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 webpack --bail --config ../../config/webpack/webpack.config.ts
scripts.synth:local: yarn build:local && cdk synth --context environment=local --context developer=$(whoami)
scripts.deploy:local: yarn build:local && cdk deploy --context environment=local --context developer=$(whoami)
scripts.nyc:coverage-report: nyc --reporter html --reporter text -t coverage --report-dir coverage/summary node ../../config/jasmine/jasmine.runner.js
scripts.test:unit: yarn run build:unit-tests && yarn run nyc
scripts.test:unit:coverage-report: yarn run build:unit-tests && yarn run nyc:coverage-report
